name: Ancient Metal
description:
Made for the E1M1 Magazine Game Jam

Invaders have come to destroy your cities - but you're here to stop them! Don your Mecha suit, equip your weapons, and go save the world! But beware, the invaders are around every corner. You can use:

  • Cyber-knife
  • Dual blasters
  • Mini gun
  • Marksman's rifle
  • Rocket launcher

Which one will you choose to save the day?

Known Issues caused by RGM:

  • Floor tiles do not line up with walls
  • Mouse sensitivity requires setting the program to High DPI compatibility mode (Properties > Compatibility > Change high DPI settings > Check both Program DPI and High DPI)
  • Game is blurry at high resolutions on NVIDIA cards. Turn off enhancement settings for the game.
  • Use AncientMetal.exe for windowed, AncientMetalFullscreen.exe for fullscreen (best on 4:3), and AncientMetalFullscreenBorder.exe for fullscreen with letterboxing (best on 16:9)
